## Installation

### Linux / macOS
```bash
curl -L https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/skillscli/releases/download/vX.Y.Z/skills-linux-x86_64.tar.gz | tar xz
sudo mv skills /usr/local/bin/
```

### Windows
Download `skills-windows-x86_64.exe.zip` from the assets below.

## Available Binaries

- `skills-linux-x86_64.tar.gz` - Linux (glibc)
- `skills-linux-x86_64-musl.tar.gz` - Linux (musl, static)
- `skills-macos-x86_64.tar.gz` - macOS (Intel)
- `skills-macos-aarch64.tar.gz` - macOS (Apple Silicon)
- `skills-windows-x86_64.exe.zip` - Windows

## Checksums

SHA256 checksums are available in `SHA256SUMS`.
